alert.note: Alert for Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:40AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Sebastian and northeastern Le Flore Counties through 515 AM CDT... At 440 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Bonanza to near Cameron to 5 miles south of Panama. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Poteau... Greenwood... Barling... Pocola... Mansfield... Hackett... Howe... Hartford... Huntington... Bonanza... Midland... Cameron... Excelsior... Fort Smith Regional Airport... Washburn... Burnville... Jenny Lind... Heavener Runestone State Park... Shady Point... This includes Interstate 540 between mile markers 9 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
